nodes.text: Purple glandis flower juice was a type juice that was illegal on the planet Hynestia. Considered to be delicious, the juice was potable to both humans and Ewoks and was served at the Stinky Jawa Cantina on Vixnix and the Frozen Kova cantina on Hynestia. Lando Calrissian once smuggled thirty barrels of the drink onto Hynestia, but was arrested on order of Queen Forsythia Jin after the cantina's Mon Calamari bartender confessed how he obtained it.
